mapper.select: SELECT TXN_CODE AS txnCode, -- トランザクションコード / 거래코드 BU_ID AS buId, -- 事業部ID / 사업부ID TXN_TYPE AS txnType, -- 区分タイプ / 구분유형 CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, -- 区分名 / 구분명 SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder, -- 表示順 / 정렬순서 USE_YN AS useYn, -- 使用可否 / 사용여부 ACCOUNT_SUBJECT AS accountSubject, -- 勘定科目 / 회계과목 COST_TYPE AS costType, -- 費用区分 / 비용구분 IS_FINISHED_PRODUCT AS isFinishedProduct,-- 製品フラグ / 완제품여부 IS_MATERIAL AS isMaterial, -- 原材料フラグ / 원자재여부 IS_SALES_USE AS isSalesUse, -- 販売用途 / 판매용여부 ADJUST_OUT AS adjustOut, -- 調整出庫 / 조정출고 ADJUST_IN AS adjustIn, -- 調整入庫 / 조정입고 IS_VAT_TARGET AS isVatTarget, -- 消費税対象 / 부가세대상 VAT_PROCESS_TYPE AS vatProcessType, -- 税処理タイプ / 세금처리유형 IS_AS AS isAs, -- A/S対象 / AS대상여부 IS_ITEM_JOURNAL AS isItemJournal, -- 品目仕訳 / 품목전표여부 IS_BYPRODUCT_IN AS isByproductIn, -- 副産物入庫 / 부산물입고 IS_RETURN_IN AS isReturnIn, -- 返品入庫 / 반품입고 IS_MOVE AS isMove, -- 移動フラグ / 이동여부 IS_TRANSFER AS isTransfer, -- 振替フラグ / 전환여부 IS_AS_OUT AS isAsOut, -- A/S出庫 / AS출고 IS_AS_RETURN AS isAsReturn, -- A/S返品 / AS반품 IS_FREE_SUPPLY AS isFreeSupply, -- 無償支給 / 무상지급 IS_DISPATCH_TARGET AS isDispatchTarget, -- 配送対象 / 출하대상 DESCRIPTION AS description, -- 備考 / 비고 CREATED_AT AS createdAt -- 登録日時 / 등록일시 FROM other_txn_category WHERE txn_type = #{txnType} ORDER BY sort_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO other_txn_category ( txn_code, bu_id, txn_type, category_name, sort_order, use_yn, account_subject, cost_type, is_finished_product, is_material, is_sales_use, adjust_out, adjust_in, is_vat_target, vat_process_type, is_as, is_item_journal, is_byproduct_in, is_return_in, is_move, is_transfer, is_as_out, is_as_return, is_free_supply, is_dispatch_target, description, created_at ) VALUES ( #{txnCode}, #{buId}, #{txnType}, #{categoryName}, #{sortOrder}, #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountSubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFinishedProduct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMaterial, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSalesUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustOut, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustIn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVatTarget, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vatProcessType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isItemJournal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isByproductIn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isReturnIn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMove, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTransfer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAsOut, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAsReturn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFreeSupply, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDispatchTarget, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE other_txn_category SET category_name = #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 区分名 / 구분명 sort_order = #{sortOrder}, -- 表示順 / 표시순서 use_yn = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 使用可否 / 사용여부 account_subject = #{accountSubject, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 勘定科目 / 회계과목 cost_type = #{costType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 費用区分 / 비용구분 is_finished_product = #{isFinishedProduct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 製品区分 / 완제품여부 is_material = #{isMaterial, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 原材料区分 / 원자재여부 is_sales_use = #{isSalesUse, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 販売用途 / 판매용여부 adjust_out = #{adjustOut, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 調整出庫 / 조정출고 adjust_in = #{adjustIn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 調整入庫 / 조정입고 is_vat_target = #{isVatTarget, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 消費税対象 / 부가세대상 vat_process_type = #{vatProcessType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 税処理タイプ / 세금처리유형 is_as = #{isAs, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- A/S対象 / AS대상여부 is_item_journal = #{isItemJournal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 品目仕訳 / 품목전표여부 is_byproduct_in = #{isByproductIn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 副産物入庫 / 부산물입고 is_return_in = #{isReturnIn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 返品入庫 / 반품입고 is_move = #{isMove, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 移動出庫 / 이동출고 is_transfer = #{isTransfer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 振替出庫 / 전환출고 is_as_out = #{isAsOut, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- A/S出庫 / AS출고 is_as_return = #{isAsReturn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- A/S返品 / AS반품 is_free_supply = #{isFreeSupply, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 無償支給 / 무상지급 is_dispatch_target = #{isDispatchTarget, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, -- 配送対象 / 출하대상 description = #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 備考 / 비고 WHERE txn_code = #{txnCode} AND bu_id = #{buId}
